hero_desc: Join the sales team powered by the world's most advanced AI CRM. We give you qualified leads, you just close them. Uncapped commissions.

benefits.title: Unlimited Leads
benefits.desc: Our Lead Hunter AI fills your calendar automatically.

benefits.title: Aggressive Commissions
benefits.desc: Earn based on talent, not seniority.

benefits.title: Edge Technology
benefits.desc: Sell a product that (almost) sells itself.

form_subtitle: Upload your CV. If you're good, we'll call.
success_msg:
Thanks {name}. We got your CV.

Our AI is analyzing your profile right now. If we spot a leader, you'll get an invite for an immediate interview.
success_speed_desc: We don't wait weeks. If you fit, we contact you in less than 24h. Watch your email.
